premiers-pas\/index.md.Si, lors de l'ouverture d'un ticket, vou: If, when opening a ticket, you get an error indicating that you have reached your quota, then you are limited to a certain number of support requests per month, depending on your service pack

premiers-pas\/index.md.Attention on voit beaucoup d'utilisateur: Be careful, we see a lot of users with "mailinblack" mailboxes, who during the first exchange ask the sender to validate a link to prove that it is indeed a human
